Great fit. I’m about 5-6 150lbs. Great high quality fabric. Blue color will match with almost any color pants. Not too heavy when wearing. Very lightweight blazer for any occasion. Great price for high end style.

This has a bit of a snug fit, but is still comfortable and nice looking. It is meant to be worn open and casually and looks great that way. It is easy to maintain and clean and doesn't wrinkle easily.
Excellent product and service!

A regular-fit blazer is a stylish essential for any man’s wardrobe. COOFANDY’s sports coats are made from high-quality polyester fabric that is lightweight, stretchy, soft, and breathable, ensuring comfort in summer or any season. The blazer’s lightweight and durable stretch fabric makes it a favorite for my husband, who appreciates its wrinkle-free, easy-care design. Featuring notched lapels, a one-button closure, two flap pockets, and a single vent, this fully lined coat showcases a unique style and fashion. It can be dressed up for business or worn casually, making it a must-have for any man looking to elevate his wardrobe.
I was really impressed with this blazer. The quality of the fabric and it is well made. It came with some wrinkles but nothing that a good steamer cannot fix.

Nice but not perfect.  I really liked the fit, where it wasn't too baggy gives it the clean put together look.  Wish the pockets were functional and not just decretive, really only has one on the inside.

评论概述: We loved this jacket so much, we got it in THREE different colors!!
评论详情: My son is 5’7” and 200lbs. Size Large. Decent quality for the price, and it arrived in 1-2days!! Once steamed/pressed, it looks great! Lighter weight jacket, so it is good for all seasons. The sleeves are a little long, but my son has this issue with all suit jackets because he’s a little thicker around the middle. He needed 3 different suit jackets for 3 different events in a row and these were PERFECT! We were extremely happy with this product and definitely order again if we ever need a quick suit jacket.

Not a 5 star jacket but that price makes It great. The cream or beige shade is lighter than the pictures in the listing. Good for job interviews and as a wedding guest. Lightweight and one front button.
Nice fitting sport coat. Sleeves are long enough. The body has just the right amount of stretch to it. Very easy to pair up

评论概述: COOFANDY Mens Casual Blazer Suit Jackets Slim Fit One Button Sport Coats Lightweight
评论详情: The jacket arrived in perfect condition, nicely packaged. The jacket is true to size and has a good fit and feel. The jacket is a great value for the money and looks like a more expensive product. The jacket has a great weight to it, Happy with purchase.

评论概述: Very pleased but I’ll have to size up!!!
评论详情: Item looks AMAZING, especially for the cost. However, I’m having to return and order a size up. I’m 5’6” and weight 205, and ordered an XL. Shoulders and length were perfect… around the waist, not so much… if sizing up ends up working for me, I can see myself ordering other colors. The texture of material and stitching appears good quality, and it doesn’t look what it cost. Aside for it not being a good fit to button because of my midsection, I’m otherwise VERY pleased with this suit jacket…can be dressed up with dress slacks or worn dressed down with a pair of jeans.

评论概述: Was Expecting to Be Disappointed But Wasn't
评论详情: When i saw the picture, I was expecting to be disappointed but when the jacket arrived I was pleasantly surprised.  The jacket is good quality, fit well and is a great look for many of the casual outings I go on.  Overall, I am very happy with the purchase.

评论概述: COOFANDY Men's Casual Blazer Suit Jackets: Stylish and Versatile
评论详情: The COOFANDY Men's Casual Blazer Suit Jackets are a fantastic blend of style, comfort, and versatility, perfect for any modern wardrobe. These jackets feature a slim fit design with a single-button closure, offering a streamlined and sophisticated look that works well in both business and casual settings.  Crafted from lightweight materials, these blazers provide all-day comfort without compromising on style. The breathable fabric ensures that you stay cool and comfortable, making them an ideal choice for various occasions, from office meetings to evening outings. The jacket’s tailored fit enhances your silhouette while maintaining ease of movement, making it suitable for both formal events and casual gatherings.  Available in a range of colors, the COOFANDY blazers can easily be paired with jeans for a smart-casual look or with dress pants for a more formal appearance. The lightweight construction means that these jackets are easy to layer, adding versatility to your wardrobe. The single-button design and minimalist style make them easy to accessorize with different shirts and ties, allowing for a variety of looks.  Overall, the COOFANDY Men's Casual Blazer Suit Jackets offer an excellent combination of style, comfort, and functionality. Whether you're dressing up for a business meeting or heading out for a casual dinner, these blazers provide a refined look without sacrificing comfort. Their lightweight fabric and modern design make them a versatile addition to any man’s wardrobe, ensuring you look sharp and feel great in any setting.
I am 5’10” 190 lbs and the XL fits perfectly. I like the fabric, color, and cut. Couldn’t be happier!

The jacket is well made and designed as well looks good. Overall very satisfied with it. It does fit a little tight in the mid section though. Overall, satisfied with the jacket except the sizing a little bit.

I really want to wear this jacket and I think it looks really great except for the wrinkles.

I’m impressed with the quality and craftsmanship of this Mens Casual Blazer Suit Jacket from COOFANDY. The material feels luxurious and holds its shape beautifully, even after a day of wear. It’s stylish, well-fitted, and adds a touch of elegance to both formal and casual outfits. Fabric and texture are good enough to dress up or down - slacks or jeans. Great addition to my business wear collection.

While my picture is t great, this is an amazing jacket! It just needs to be ironed. It's a very excellent quality, my college son loves it. Perfect fo his formals, interviews and more! The stitching was on point and no issues. I'm very happy as well as my son with this purchase!

评论概述: Inexpensive blazer that actually looks nice
评论详情: It's like a white whale. We all know it's out there, but rarely does one get to see it in real life:  A men's blazer that's decent quality AND a good price.  I know--it sounds like an urban legend.  Yet here it is:  it's well-sewn, and while it may not have the abundance of pockets some blazers tend to have, it's got the basics, and that's it needs.The cut of the blazer is a nice slim fit, and it looks good buttoned or unbuttoned.

My husband hasn’t purchased a new blazer in many years.  Since prices of everything have skyrocketed, he decided to try this $59.99 COOFANDY jacket, that now offers a $15 coupon, for an upcoming wedding.  It is a slim fit and he is not slim so he went with the XXL.  It does fit and looks okay, but lacks the quality he was able to get years ago.  That said, things are very different now and I think, for the price, this coat will be nice to wear to the upcoming wedding.  Check your measurements and order accordingly.

评论概述: Great option for my teenage son
评论详情: I got this for my teenage son who is super skinny. The small fits well. Since my son is still growing I did not want to invest in a super expensive jacket. This was a good price point for what I needed and having previously purchased a suit for him from this brand, I knew it would be a good value. We ordered the navy, which pairs well with khaki pants or grey pants. As shown in the pictures, item is extremely wrinkled when it arrives, but wrinkles can be removed with steaming. Note that the jacket we received did not have care instructions included.

This isn't an amazing top of the line blazer, but if you need a sports coat for the occasional "slightly formal" event, this is an excellent option. It was pretty wrinkled when it arrived, but just using a steamer was good enough to get it looking good. This is a great value for the money.
Nice fit for XL shoulders & 34 inch waist.

评论概述: Nice Sport Coat, but Sizing is Off
评论详情: This is a very nice, bold royal blue sport coat.  The look and material are similar to other $50 sport coats.  Not top of the line, but definitely looks nice and wearable.  My main problem with this jacket is the sizing.  The ad tells you to size up one level for a looser fit.  However, these clearly run very small.  I sized up from a 2XL to a 3XL.  The 2XL claims to support a 52" chest, which is what I wear in Suits and Sport Coats.  However, given that this was a foreign item, I took their warning and sized up to the 3XL which is supposedly a 55" chest.  It is still tight even though it claims to be 3" bigger than the size I usually wear.Overall, nice looking and the quality is on par with the price point.  But sizing is way off.

COOFANDY Mens Casual Blazer Suit Jackets My Review:  I recently added the COOFANDY Mens Casual Blazer Suit Jacket to my wardrobe, and it has quickly become one of my go-to pieces for smart-casual occasions.  Key Features:  1. Stylish Design: The blazer has a modern, tailored fit that looks sharp and polished. It’s versatile enough to dress up or down, making it suitable for both casual and semi-formal events. 2. Comfortable Fabric: Made from a blend of materials, the fabric is soft, breathable, and comfortable to wear for extended periods. 3. Functional Pockets: The blazer includes several well-placed pockets, adding both style and practicality.  Pros:  • Versatility: Works well with jeans for a casual look or with dress pants for a more formal appearance. • Fit and Comfort: The fit is flattering and comfortable, with a good range of motion. • Affordable: Offers great value for the price, giving a high-end look without breaking the bank.  Cons:  • Sizing: Sizing can be a bit tricky, so it might require some trial and error to get the perfect fit. • Maintenance: The fabric may require careful maintenance to avoid wrinkles and keep it looking sharp.  Overall, I am very pleased with the COOFANDY Mens Casual Blazer Suit Jacket. It’s a stylish and versatile addition to my wardrobe, perfect for various occasions.

Ordered this for my husband in Navy, and I was concerned the fit would be off. I’m happy to say that the 3xl fit true to size for a 6’3 280 lbs man. He looks great in it and has plenty of room to move his arms and button/wrap the blazer around him in front. It truly looks like it was made for him. The quality of the material is super, the stitching is excellent and held up well for our needs.  Very excited to find a great clothing option for big and tall men online!

评论概述: A bit on the small side
评论详情: This is a casual jacket that is nice to have on hand for occasions where a bit more than a collared shirt is called for, but not necessarily a tie.  It doesn't look expensive, but then again, it doesn't claim to be anything more than for a casual occasion.  I got a 3XL for my husband, even though he typically takes 2XL in shirts, and it was still a bit small.  It wasn't by a whole lot, but still a bit disappointing.  It will need a good ironing or steaming to get out the creases, but it is nice to have on hand for a semi-formal type occasion.  It is a very good price and of decent quality.

Before all the good things I have to say, let me explain the picture of the extremely crumbled blazer.  This blazer came all tight and secured packaged, so much so that I was unable to get the wrinkles out.  The picture was taken a week after I opened it put it on a hanger.  I hung it in a steamy shower as well as put it in a dryer on low heat with a damp towel.  Finally, I took it to a professional cleaners and had it steamed which made it look great.As for the blazer itself, I'm very impressed.  The stitching is top quality as you can see in the pictures.  It is lighter weight than I expected but that's a plus.  This will be great for cooler Fall weather (which I hope comes soon!).  It fits very well (I ordered the size I normally wear) and is quite comfortable.In summary, I am very pleased and to me this blazer looks more expensive than it actually is.

This blazer effortlessly combines style, comfort, and versatility, making it perfect for various occasions. The slim fit and one-button closure create a modern and sophisticated look that pairs well with both casual and formal attire and the lightweight fabric is perfect for year-round wear. The X-Large size fits my 6' 4" athletic frame perfectly, offering a tailored look without feeling restrictive. It's suitable for business meetings, casual outings, and even sports events, making it a great addition to my wardrobe.  Overall, it's a fantastic choice for anyone looking to elevate their style. Its sleek design, comfortable fit, and versatility make it a must-have for any wardrobe. Highly recommended!

This blazer fits okay but not perfect. It’s a little small in that when I raise my arms it rides up with me and looks a little short. When I stand still, it looks like it fits okay. It buttons well, sits across my shoulders and the length is good. I think it’s probably a little tight across the shoulders but if I went larger it would be too big other places. The blazer itself is nice looking. I like the way it falls and feels. It was delivered without any wrinkles so I could wear it right away. It’s a nice blazer, I just wish it fit me better.
